sentences.en: A house is halfway up the hill.
sentences.cn: 山的半中腰有一座房子.

sentences.en: All I had to do was be halfway cool.
sentences.cn: 我要做的只是保持适度的冷静。

sentences.en: Halfway down the cigarette she had a fit of coughing.
sentences.cn: 烟抽到一半，她突然一阵猛咳。

sentences.en: Halfway up the hill , the engine packed up.
sentences.cn: 走到半山腰, 发动机熄火了.

sentences.en: He lost his way halfway to the shop.
sentences.cn: 他在去商店的半道儿迷路了.

sentences.en: He was halfway up the ladder.
He who wills success is halfway to it.
sentences.cn: 热切争取成功等于成功了一半.

sentences.en: It was a terrible film - I left halfway through.
sentences.cn: 这部电影太烂，我看到一半就离场了。

sentences.en: It's about halfway between London and Bristol.
sentences.cn: 它大约位于伦敦和布里斯托尔的中间。

sentences.en: She was halfway down when she heard the noise.
sentences.cn: 她向下走到一半时，听到了响声。

sentences.en: The car broke down on the halfway.
The Newton Hotel is halfway up a steep hill.
sentences.cn: 丽东酒店位于陡峭的半山腰上。

sentences.en: They wouldn't stop halfway however great the difficulties might be.
sentences.cn: 不管困难多大,他们也不会半途而废.

sentences.en: traffic queues stretching back halfway to London
sentences.cn: 中途停滞、一路排到伦敦的汽车长龙

sentences.en: We had got only halfway when it began to get dark.
Welsh international Matthew Postle was third fastest at the halfway point.
sentences.cn: 到半程时，威尔士的世界级选手马修·波斯特尔位居第三。

sentences.en: You need hard currency to get anything halfway decent.
sentences.cn: 你得有硬通货才能买到还算不错的东西。

words.tran_cn: 一半的；不完全的；半途的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 路程之中途地点；小客栈

trans.tran_cn: 中途的；部分的；不彻底的
trans.tran_en: at a middle point in space or time between two things

trans.tran_cn: 在中间，在中途，完成…的一半，过得去地
trans.tran_en: Halfway means in the middle of a place or between two points, at an equal distance from each of them
